system.description:
Requirements: you must have mastered one or more Classes among Chanter, Esper, and Orator, and must have acquired the My Trust in You Skill.

When you use @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.lK9onKSiMuQEe3zd]{My Trust in You} on another Player Character, that character chooses Dexterity, Insight, Might, or Willpower: they treat the chosen Attribute as being increased by one die size (up to a maximum of d12) until the end of the scene or until you use My Trust in You on them again.

Ally Receives: @EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.2TtzNh1YqFDLyOKo], @EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.aGBmSaKFRyInlX7r], @EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.GChgfUsVVDlhM9Y8], or @EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.0cahhGuSayt6t5CW]
